metadata.synopsis: Dialog with a prisoner in Cazador's Dungeon. Talking to herself, mostly out of her mind.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Fallback dialog (player shouldn't be able to trigger it naturally).Use oe startDialog to test.

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *He stands silently, staring intently at nothing.*

1.speaker: Gondlemead
1.text: Days. Months. Years. They're all the same...
